about_the_game:
We took very long time to find “right” music for the game. And eventually the composers and us designed the concept “Future Bass + ancient instruments”. The ancient Chinese music instrument Qu Qin which’s been existed for over 2000 years in China and still lot of players and fans. And Shaman used to be “popular” around world even in the North China. And we recorded sort of Shaman drums. Except traditional performance, the players Yoon Lee(L.A.) also tried altered way to play, for example striking the GuQin strings by chopsticks. And also we invited masters Mr. XiaoKui Ding(Chinese flutes, BeiJing) and Mr. Hamid Saeidi (Santur, L.A.). For this original soundtrack album, we invited the in-game music composers to do the re-arrangement, mixing and mastering. The album contains 18 tracks and over 36 minutes.

01. JJ's Theme
02. Black Smoke
03. Finding The Truth
04. The Ghosts Of Evil Kings
05. Hard-Fought Progress

07. The Puppet Monarch
08. Battling The Dragon

11. The Final Battle
12. Tragic Developments
13. The Demonic Machine
14. The Haunted Town
15. JJ Escapes
16. The Cult Leader
17. Spider Battle
18. The Temple

Upon purchase, the files will be downloaded to the Bladed game folder in your Steam directory.
